remarks: If two real numbers are less than a third real number, the sum of the real numbers is less then twice the third real number.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-May-2018.)
statement: 2leaddle2 $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( ( A < C /\ B < C ) -> ( A + B ) < ( 2 x. C ) ) ) $.
